Class TruffleStringBuilderUTF16

java.lang.Object
com.oracle.truffle.api.strings.TruffleStringBuilder
com.oracle.truffle.api.strings.TruffleStringBuilderUTF16
public final class TruffleStringBuilderUTF16 extends TruffleStringBuilder
The UTF-16-specific variant of TruffleStringBuilder. For best performance, use this type explicitly wherever possible.
Since:
23.1
